name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Classic salad made with romaine lettuce, grilled chicken, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

name: Moules Marinières
description: French dish of mussels cooked in white wine, garlic, shallots, and parsley, often served with fries.

name: Pulled Pork Sandwich
description: American sandwich made with slow-cooked, shredded pork shoulder, often served on a bun with barbecue sauce.

name: Spanakopita
description: Greek savory pastry filled with spinach, feta cheese, onions, and herbs, baked in layers of phyllo dough.

name: Kung Pao Chicken
description: Chinese dish of stir-fried chicken with peanuts, vegetables, and chili peppers, in a spicy, savory sauce.

name: Gyudon
description: Japanese dish of thinly sliced beef and onions simmered in a sweet and savory sauce, served over rice.

name: Meatball Sub
description: Italian-American sandwich made with meatballs, marinara sauce, and melted cheese, served in a long roll.

name: Chicken Cordon Bleu
description: French dish of breaded and fried chicken breast stuffed with ham and cheese.

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Dish made by filling bell peppers with a mixture of ground meat, rice, cheese, and seasonings, then baking until tender.

name: Hainanese Chicken Rice
description: Singaporean dish of poached chicken and seasoned rice, served with chili sauce and cucumber slices.

name: Chicken Shawarma
description: Middle Eastern dish of seasoned, thinly sliced chicken cooked on a vertical rotisserie, typically served in pita bread with tahini sauce.

name: Birria Tacos
description: Mexican tacos filled with tender, slow-cooked birria meat (usually beef or goat), topped with onions, cilantro, and salsa.

name: Chicken Katsu
description: Japanese breaded and fried chicken cutlets served with tonkatsu sauce.

name: Egg Fried Rice
description: Chinese dish of fried rice cooked with eggs, vegetables, and soy sauce.

name: Salmon Teriyaki
description: Japanese dish of grilled salmon glazed with a sweet teriyaki sauce.

name: Caprese Salad
description: Italian salad made with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, basil, and olive oil.

name: Vegetable Biryani
description: Indian rice dish cooked with aromatic spices, vegetables, and basmati rice.

name: Beef Empanadas
description: Latin American pastries filled with seasoned ground beef and baked or fried.

name: Lobster Bisque
description: French creamy soup made with lobster, broth, cream, and sherry.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: Chinese dish of mixed vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.

name: Chicken Fajitas
description: Mexican dish of grilled chicken strips served with sautéed peppers and onions.

name: Tiramisu
description: Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.

name: Lentil Soup
description: Hearty soup made with lentils, vegetables, and sometimes meat or sausage.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Mexican tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
description: Classic soup made with chicken, vegetables, and egg noodles in a broth.

name: Seafood Paella
description: Spanish rice dish cooked with a variety of seafood, saffron, and vegetables.

name: Crispy Duck
description: Chinese dish of duck with crispy skin and tender meat, often served with pancakes and hoisin sauce.

name: Lemon Meringue Pie
description: Classic dessert consisting of lemon curd filling topped with meringue, baked in a pie crust.

name: Shrimp Fried Rice
description: Chinese dish of fried rice cooked with shrimp, vegetables, and soy sauce.

name: Pork Dumplings
description: Chinese dumplings filled with seasoned ground pork, often steamed or pan-fried.

name: Peking Duck
description: Chinese dish of roasted duck served with hoisin sauce, scallions, and pancakes.

name: Risotto
description: Italian rice dish cooked with broth until creamy, often with added ingredients like mushrooms or seafood.

name: Bibimbap
description: Korean rice dish topped with assorted vegetables, meat, a fried egg, and spicy sauce.

name: Fish Tacos
description: Mexican tacos filled with battered and fried fish, topped with cabbage slaw and creamy sauce.

name: Chicken Satay
description: Thai or Indonesian dish of skewered and grilled chicken served with peanut sauce.

name: Beef Wellington
description: British dish of beef tenderloin coated with pâté and wrapped in puff pastry.

name: Pierogi
description: Polish dumplings filled with various ingredients such as potatoes, cheese, or meat.

name: Falafel
description: Middle Eastern fried balls made from ground chickpeas or fava beans, typically served in pita bread.

name: Rendang
description: Indonesian spicy meat dish slow-cooked in coconut milk and spices until tender.

name: Cannelloni
description: Italian pasta tubes filled with a savory mixture, typically baked in sauce and cheese.

name: Tamales
description: Latin American dish made of masa dough filled with meats, cheese, or vegetables, wrapped in corn husks and steamed.

name: Massaman Curry
description: Thai curry dish made with a rich, creamy sauce, potatoes, peanuts, and tender meat.

name: Hamburger
description: American sandwich consisting of a grilled beef patty served in a bun with various toppings.

name: Miso Soup
description: Japanese soup made with dashi broth, miso paste, tofu, seaweed, and green onions.

name: Fettuccine Alfredo
description: Italian pasta dish made with fettuccine noodles tossed in a creamy Parmesan sauce.

name: Chicken Adobo
description: Filipino dish of chicken marinated in vinegar, soy sauce, garlic, and spices, then braised until tender.

name: Shakshuka
description: Middle Eastern dish of poached eggs in a spiced tomato and pepper sauce, often served with bread.

name: Pad See Ew
description: Thai stir-fried noodles dish with wide rice noodles, egg, Chinese broccoli, and soy sauce.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: Russian dish made with sautéed beef strips, mushrooms, onions, and sour cream sauce, served over noodles or rice.

name: Tandoori Chicken
description: Indian dish of marinated chicken cooked in a tandoor oven, resulting in smoky, flavorful meat.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Italian-American dish made with breaded and fried eggplant slices, layered with marinara sauce and cheese.

name: Pasta Primavera
description: Italian pasta dish with fresh vegetables, often including bell peppers, tomatoes, broccoli, and carrots, in a light sauce.

name: Kebab
description: Middle Eastern dish of skewered and grilled meat, often served with rice or flatbread and yogurt sauce.

name: Bangers and Mash
description: British dish of sausages (bangers) served with mashed potatoes, often accompanied by onion gravy.

name: Pho
description: Vietnamese noodle soup made with broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat (typically beef or chicken).

name: Beef Bulgogi
description: Korean dish of thinly sliced marinated beef, grilled or stir-fried and typically served with rice and lettuce wraps.

name: Quiche Lorraine
description: French savory tart filled with bacon, cheese, and a creamy egg custard, baked in a pastry crust.

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Creamy Indian curry dish with tender chicken marinated in spices and served with a tomato-based sauce.

name: Beef Bourguignon
description: French beef stew cooked with red wine, mushrooms, onions, and bacon.

name: Sushi Rolls
description: Japanese dish consisting of vinegared rice, seafood, and vegetables rolled in seaweed.

name: Tacos al Pastor
description: Mexican street tacos filled with marinated pork, pineapple, onions, and cilantro.

name: Pad Thai
description: Thai stir-fried noodles dish with tofu, shrimp, peanuts, bean sprouts, and lime.

name: Grilled Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
description: Seafood dish featuring grilled salmon fillets topped with a tangy lemon butter sauce.

name: BBQ Ribs
description: American-style ribs coated in barbecue sauce and slow-cooked until tender.

name: Paella
description: Spanish saffron-infused rice dish cooked with seafood, chicken, and vegetables.

name: Moussaka
description: Greek casserole dish made with layers of eggplant, minced meat, and creamy béchamel sauce.

name: Chicken Parmesan
description: Italian-American dish featuring breaded chicken cutlets topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese.

name: Beef Stir-Fry with Vegetables
description: Chinese dish of thinly sliced beef cooked with assorted vegetables in a savory sauce.

name: Lamb Tagine
description: Moroccan slow-cooked stew made with tender lamb, dried fruits, and aromatic spices.

name: Chicken Curry
description: Indian dish of chicken simmered in a flavorful curry sauce made with spices, tomatoes, and coconut milk.

name: Chili con Carne
description: Tex-Mex chili made with ground beef, beans, tomatoes, and chili peppers.

name: Roast Chicken with Herbs
description: European-style roast chicken seasoned with herbs, garlic, and lemon.

name: Veggie Burger
description: Vegetarian or vegan burger patty made from vegetables, grains, and legumes.

name: Shepherd's Pie
description: British comfort food dish made with minced meat, vegetables, and mashed potatoes.

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Italian-American dish of shrimp cooked in garlic, butter, lemon juice, and white wine.

name: Steak Frites
description: French dish consisting of steak served with French fries and a side of salad.

name: Enchiladas
description: Mexican dish made with corn tortillas rolled around a filling, covered with sauce, and baked.

name: Lasagna
description: Italian pasta dish made with layers of lasagna noodles, meat sauce, and cheese.

name: Butter Chicken
description: Indian dish of tender chicken cooked in a creamy, mildly spiced tomato sauce.

name: Coq au Vin
description: French chicken dish braised in red wine with mushrooms, onions, and bacon.

name: Ramen
description: Japanese noodle soup dish with broth, wheat noodles, meat, and vegetables.

name: Carnitas
description: Mexican dish of slow-cooked pork shoulder, shredded and served with tortillas.

name: Tom Yum Soup
description: Thai hot and sour soup made with lemongrass, lime, chili, and shrimp or chicken.

name: Gumbo
description: Southern US stew made with a roux base, vegetables, seafood, and/or meat.

name: Yakitori
description: Japanese skewered and grilled chicken, typically served with tare sauce.
